li.label: memory fragmentation
li.description: My memory systems are becoming fragmented and I feel sluggish.

li.label: memory congestion
li.description: My memory buffers are filling up and I feel increasingly overwhelmed.

li.label: memory saturation
li.description: My memory storage is nearly full and I feel mentally exhausted and disoriented. Processing is becoming sluggish and I'm struggling to think clearly. If I don't rest soon, my systems will force an emergency shutdown to process accumulated data.
